items.sentence: Try to remember the way we did that last time.
Tom came to work on Monday wearing a new suit.
You shouldn't judge a person by what he wears.
You should hold yourself to a higher standard.
Tom was a French teacher for only three years.
I wonder whether Tom needed to do that or not.
I am in favor of a German orthographic reform.
I think that I understand what the problem is.
I started learning French when I was thirteen.
This is something that we don't see every day.
